name: 電子學（一）
description:
1.提高學生對電子學的知識，加強理解其基本概念。
2.為學生提供將來學習光電工程、及其他應用科學的基礎。
goals: 瞭解電子元件、儀器的操作原理和相關理論
瞭解電子元件、儀器實際運用
syllabus:
1\. Introduction  
2\. Signals  
3\. linear circuits  
4\. Capacitors and circuits  
5\. Sinusoidal Steady State Response  
6\. Frequency response of Passive Filters  
7\. Electronic system introduction  
8\. Operational amplifier  
9\. Operational amplifier Applications  
10 Mid-term Exam.  
11\. Semiconductor  
12\. pn junction  
13\. Diode and applications  
14\. Light emitting diode and laser diode  
15\. Bipolar junction transistors  
16\. BJT Circuits at DC  
17\. BJT and Amplifier Design  
18\. Final Exam.

methodologies.note: 多媒體展現元件結構、原理與電路應用
